summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Zeina & Khazina Arabic RTL gold trading app. Backend APIs working excellently (96.7% success rate), frontend navigation and RTL layout working perfectly. Admin authentication successful. Minor issues with wallet endpoint and cart button visibility.

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 520 Internal Server Error due to MongoDB ObjectId serialization issue
critical_bugs.error_details: ValueError: ObjectId object is not iterable - FastAPI JSON encoder issue

ui_bugs.issue: Button text not visible - buttons present but empty text content

passed_tests: Home page loads with gold prices (24K, 22K, 21K, 18K)
RTL layout working correctly across all pages
Navigation between all pages working (الرئيسية, الاستثمار, الهدايا, المتجر, حسابي)
Store page displays merchants and products
Gifts page loads with Arabic content
Investment page loads with Arabic content
Backend API testing: 29/30 tests passed (96.7% success rate)
Arabic text display throughout the app
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix wallet endpoint MongoDB ObjectId serialization issue in server.py. Verify add to cart button text visibility in ProductCard component. Consider adding data-testid attributes to cart buttons for better testing.
